cards.name: Higashi, the Master

attacks.description: Chance to interrupt the opponent's attack.
attacks.name: Open Palm

attacks.description: High chance for a critical hit.
attacks.name: Dashing Strike

attacks.description: Chance to stun the enemy for 1 turn.
attacks.name: Sweep

attacks.description: May burn the foe for 3 damage each for 4 turns.
attacks.name: Chi Blast

cards.ability_description: When Higashi successfully intercepts, he deals 60 damage to the foe.
cards.description:
Higashi's power at any range makes him a legendary martial arts master, but he doesn't like being walked out on.

Group: Martial Artists
Strengths: Physical Attacks, Speed, All Range Combat
Vulnerabilities: Low Defenses

cards.name: Rumiko, the Ninja

attacks.description: A rapid stream of shurikens.
attacks.name: Shuriken Barrage

attacks.description: If hits, causes Rumiko to teleport away and sets the range to far.
attacks.name: Ninja-port

attacks.description: Chance to poison the enemy for 5 damage each for 4 turns.
attacks.name: Poison Dart

attacks.description: High chance to stun the enemy for 1 turn.
attacks.name: Eviscerate

info.description: Has a 50% chance to avoid intercepts when she switches out

cards.ability_description: Rumiko has a 50% chance to avoid intercepts when she switches out.
cards.description:
Rumiko is quite a catch - if you can catch her - but watch for flying shuriken.

Group: Martial Artists
Strengths: Range-Change, Long-Range Attacks
Vulnerabilities: Dark Magic Attacks

cards.name: Onimaru, the Samurai

attacks.description: Knocks a buff off the enemy.
attacks.name: Sword Flurry

attacks.description: Chance to prevent the foe from changing ranges next turn.
attacks.name: Double Slash

attacks.description: High chance to reduce the foe's physical defense by 10 for 5 turns.
attacks.name: Ancestral Curse

attacks.description: High chance to increase physical/light/dark resists by 2/3/4 for 4 turns.
attacks.name: Ancestral Spirit

info.description: Physical Defense Resistance +2, Light Magic Resistance +3, Dark Magic Resistance +4 for 4 turns
Cannot be hit by critical hits

cards.ability_description: Onimaru cannot be hit by critical hits.
cards.description:
The strong silent type, Onimaru can pummel you in close conversations but may curse you from afar.

Group: Martial Artists
Strengths: Physical Attacks, Physical Defense, Health
Vulnerabilities: Long-Range Attacks, Speed

cards.name: Yoshiro, the Student

attacks.description: Can stun the opponent for 1 turn.
attacks.name: Open Palm

attacks.description: A very fast attack that hits even a fleeing opponent.
attacks.name: Rising Dragon

attacks.description: Reflects any light magic attack back at the foe. Can't be used 2 turns in a row.
attacks.name: Chi Reflect

attacks.description: May burn the foe for 5 damage each for 3 turns.
attacks.name: Chi Blast

info.description: Has an additional 10% chance to dodge physical attacks and intercepts.

cards.ability_description: Yoshiro has an additional 10% chance to dodge physical attacks and intercepts.
cards.description:
You can run from Yoshiro's Rising Dragon, but you can't hide. He's got a glass jaw for physical attacks, though -- light magic defense is more his style.

Group: Martial Artists
Strengths: Speed, Physical Attacks, Light Magic
Vulnerabilities: Physical Attacks, Dark Magic

cards.name: Andromeda, the Archer

attacks.description: Hits even a fleeing opponent.
attacks.name: Rain of Arrows

attacks.description: High chance for a critical hit.
attacks.name: Trueshot

attacks.description: Chance to prevent the foe from changing ranges next turn.
attacks.name: Crippling Shot

attacks.description: Interrupts light magic attacks. Can't be used 2 turns in a row.
attacks.name: Lightning Arrow

cards.ability_description: Changing ranges costs 5 less energy than usual.
cards.description:
Andromeda is stunning at a distance, but she's not quite as pretty up close.

Group: Amazons
Strengths: Long-Range Attacks, Hitting Fleeing Enemies
Vulnerabilities: Short-Range Attacks

cards.name: Helene, the Swordstress

attacks.description: If this attack hits first, it cancels the enemy's attack this turn.
attacks.name: Shield Bash

attacks.description: Slashes furiously, releasing her inner demons.
attacks.name: Frenzied Strikes

attacks.description: Half the time, restores 20 of your energy from increased adrenaline.
attacks.name: Sword Slash

attacks.description: All blade attacks are light magic and deal +2 damage for 3 turns.
attacks.name: Enchant Blade

info.description: Light Magic increased +2 on Blade Attacks for 3 turns

cards.ability_description: Helene cannot be stunned.
cards.description:
Helene dazzles at close range with her physical attacks, armor, and "assets", but don't try a long-distance relationship.

Group: Amazons
Strengths: Speed, physical defense, health
Vulnerabilities: Long-range combat, dark magic.

cards.name: Phoebe, the Lasher

attacks.description: Chance to cause the enemy to bleed for 2 damage each for 4 turns.
attacks.name: Rapid Lashes

attacks.description: Has a chance to stun the opponent for 1 turn.
attacks.name: Power Lash

attacks.description: Causes enemy's range changing costs to increase by 20 energy for 3 turns.
attacks.name: Hamstring

info.description: You must use +20 energy to change range.

attacks.description: Reduces the enemy's chance to hit by 20% for 4 turns.
attacks.name: Deafening Crack

info.description: Attacks have a 25% chance of disabling the enemy's item

cards.ability_description: Her attacks have a 25% chance of disabling the enemy's item.
cards.description:
Phoebe is a strict disciplinarian, but keep her close -- unless you enjoy punishment.

Group: Amazons
Strengths: Long Range Attacks, Speed
Vulnerabilities: Close Range Attacks

cards.name: Anex, the Warrior Princess

attacks.description: Hits even a fleeing opponent.
attacks.name: Boomerang Chakram

attacks.description: Has a high chance to knock the foe out of the battle.
attacks.name: Power Toss

attacks.description: Enemy's attack is 2 slower for the next 2 turns.
attacks.name: Chakram Slash

attacks.description: Chakram attacks are light magic and deal +8 damage for 3 turns.
attacks.name: Enchant Blade

info.description: Light Magic increased +8 on Blade Attacks for 3 turns
Deals 50% more damage when health is below 30%

cards.ability_description: When Anex's health is below 30%, she deals 50% more damage.
cards.description:
Anex is a warrior princess with powerful attacks - and she'll kick anybody out of battle who doesn't show the proper respect.

Group: Amazons
Strengths: Tossing Enemies Out of Battle, Hitting Fleeing Enemies
Vulnerabilities: Dark Magic Attacks

cards.name: Juju, the Shaman

attacks.description: Dark forces from the void rapidly strike the enemy.
attacks.name: Hex

attacks.description: Bleeds the opponent for 20 damage at the end of next turn. Can't be removed.
attacks.name: Curse of Juju

info.description: Impending bleed of 20 damage next turn

attacks.description: Heals you for +25 HP. Can't be used 2 turns in a row.
attacks.name: Healing Touch

attacks.description: Counts down for 4 turns, then deals 99 damage. Can't be removed.
attacks.name: Touch of Doom

info.description: 20% chance to cure a debuff each turn.

cards.ability_description: Juju has a 20% chance each turn to cure a debuff on himself.
cards.description:
Juju carries doom in his pocket, but for all his magic he can't take a punch.

Group: Villagers
Strengths: Powerful Dark Magic Attack, Self-Healing
Vulnerabilities: Physical Attacks, Speed

cards.name: Ubuntu, the Elder

attacks.description: Has a chance to increase your team's damage on single-hit attacks by 4 for 10 turns.
attacks.name: Staff Strike

attacks.description: Has a chance to increase your team's crit rate by 25% for 10 turns.
attacks.name: Tiger Claws

attacks.description: Increases all your characters' damage by 1 for 10 turns.
attacks.name: Rain Dance

attacks.description: After one full turn, summoned spirit attacks foe for 50 damage.
attacks.name: Spirit Assistance

info.description: Impending Spirit Attack for 50 damage next turn

cards.ability_description: While Ubuntu is in play, enemy attacks cost 5 additional energy.
cards.description:
Ubuntu has powerful friends in spiritual places, but physical attacks can bring him down to earth.

Group: Villagers
Strengths: Powerful Dark Magic Attack, Physical Attacks
Vulnerabilities: Physical Attacks

cards.name: Popo, the Younger

attacks.description: High miss rate, but if it hits has a high chance to crit for triple damage.
attacks.name: Slingshot

attacks.description: Chance to poison the enemy for 10 damage each for 4 turns.
attacks.name: Poison Dart

attacks.description: If this attack hits first, it cancels the enemy's attack this turn.
attacks.name: Knee Bash

attacks.description: Your attacks will poison for 3 damage per turn for 4 turns. 30% chance to heal 25 hp.
attacks.name: Herbal Preparations

procs.effects: Cast : { Name : Herbal Preparations, description : Poisoned by Herbal Preparations, Attack_no : [1, 2, 3], Target : enemy, Effects : {Damage Effect : {Type : Poison, HP : 3}}, Length : 3, Info: {display: Poisoned, icon : poison, description : "Poisoned by Herbal Preperations, take 3 damage for 4 turns"} }

cards.ability_description: Popo has a 25% chance to dodge physical attacks.
cards.description:
Never underestimate the power of a child with a slingshot and a gender identity crisis.

Group: Villagers
Strengths: Speed, Dodging, Critical Hits
Vulnerabilities: Physical Attacks, Light Magic Attacks

cards.name: Tafari, the Trapper

attacks.description: Chance to poison the enemy for 3 damage each for 4 turns.
attacks.name: Poison Dart

attacks.description: For the next 4 turns, next enemy using physical attack takes 45 damage.
attacks.name: Leafy Trap

procs.effects: Trap : {Type : Physical, HP : 45, Sprung By : Physical}

info.description: Physical attacks will spring a trap that causes 45 damage

attacks.description: Increases your chance to avoid physical attacks by 30% until the end of next turn.
attacks.name: Hide

info.description: Ambush attack unlocked, 30% increased dodge against physical attacks

attacks.description: Can only be done after hiding. Deals very high damage.
attacks.name: Ambush

cards.ability_description: Enemies cannot switch out against Tafari.
cards.description:
Tafari can block his enemy's options with his clever traps, but sometimes a bludgeon beats finesse.

Group: Villagers
Strengths: Enemies Cannot Switch Out, Traps
Vulnerabilities: Light Magic Attacks, Has Low Damage Attacks

cards.name: Cornelius Constantine, the Suave

attacks.description: Reduces the enemy's dark resistance by 2 for 4 turns.
attacks.name: Voidstream

attacks.description: Enemy's resistance and damage are reduced by 2 for 5 turns.
attacks.name: Blood Burn

attacks.description: 25% chance to crush enemy's soul for 20 dark magic damage.
attacks.name: Pilebunker

attacks.description: If this strikes first, the enemy attacks himself. Can't be used 2 turns in a row.
attacks.name: Hypnotic Stare

immune: single hit attack final damage bonus

cards.ability_description: Immune to stat-lowering effects.
cards.description:
One glance into Cornelius Constantine's eyes and he'll wear down anyone's resistances, but no one can do the same to him.

Group: Dark Magic Attacks and Defense, Physical Attacks, Lowering Resistances
Vulnerabilities: Light Magic Attacks, Speed

cards.name: Cain Solomon, the Quarterback

attacks.description: Reduces enemy's dark resistance by 1 for 4 turns.
attacks.name: Voidstream

attacks.description: Hits 5 times.
attacks.name: Rush of Bats

attacks.description: Increases Cain Solomon, the Quarterback's damage by 3 for 3 turns.
attacks.name: Tantrum

attacks.description: If this attack hits first, has a chance to cancel the enemy's attack.
attacks.name: Tackle

info.description: When health is below 30%, damage is increased by 50%

cards.ability_description: When Cain Solomon's health is below 30%, he deals 50% more damage.
cards.description:
Cain's got an immortal temper and Friday Night regrets, but turn up the light magic and you can score.

Group: Vampires
Strengths: Dark Magic Attacks, Physical Attacks
Vulnerabilities: Light Magic Attacks

cards.name: Ambrosia Thorn, the Blood Worshiper

attacks.description: Drains the life essence of the victim and heals you.
attacks.name: Vamp Kiss

attacks.description: Chokes even a fleeing opponent.
attacks.name: Spectral Choke

attacks.description: Deep wounds bleed the opponent for 6 damage each turn for 4 turns. Can't be removed.
attacks.name: Bleeding Ritual

attacks.description: Chance to stun the enemy for 1 turn.
attacks.name: Spiked Boots

info.description: Immune to poison and burn effects

cards.ability_description: Ambrosia Thorn is immune to poison and burn effects.
cards.description:
Ambrosia drains her enemies' lives with a kiss, but if they keep their distance they may avoid temptation.

Group: Vampires
Strengths: Self-Healing, Stunning
Vulnerabilities: Light Magic Attacks, Long Range Attacks

cards.name: Marquis Le Morte, the Ancient

attacks.description: Steals half the life it drains.
attacks.name: Vampiric Touch

attacks.description: Steals all the life it drains.
attacks.name: Life Drain

attacks.description: Sets the range to close.
attacks.name: Teleport

attacks.description: Enemy's resistances and damage are reduced by 3 for 5 turns.
attacks.name: Blood Burn

info.description: Regains 20 hit points upon leaving play

cards.ability_description: When Marquis Le Morte leaves play, he regains 20 hit points.
cards.description:
Marquis Le Morte is walking death. Hard to kill but even harder to kill with, he bleeds his victims dry a little at a time.

Group: Vampires
Strengths: Self-Healing, Dark Magic Defense
Vulnerabilities: Physical Attacks, Light Magic Attacks

cards.name: Caltrops

info.card_album_desc: Best on a character who the opponent wants to switch out against. Onimaru and Higashi probably capitalize on this the best, and you also gain the more intangible advantage that the opponent doesn't want to switch at all against Caltrops.

cards.ability_description: Deals 14 damage to any enemy that switches out.

cards.name: Scroll of Inner Focus

info.card_album_desc: Great item for any Martial Artist, except possibly Yoshiro (though still ok on him too). The energy savings really add up as the turns go on.

cards.ability_description: Reduces energy costs of your moves by 5.

cards.name: Jade Figurine

info.card_album_desc: Best on Amaya (because Amaya's low hit points), the Figurine allows you to avoid getting one-shot killed.

cards.ability_description: Grants 15 extra health.

cards.name: Flash Powder

info.description: When you switch out, gives 40% chance to avoid intercepts.
info.card_album_desc: Lets you switch characters more safely, so could be used on anyone. When used with Rumiko, it makes her extremely difficult to intercept.

cards.ability_description: When you switch out, gives 40% chance to avoid intercepts.

cards.name: Sacred Candle

info.card_album_desc: The Candle can prevent a ridiculous number of effects throughout the game, making it a strong choice on any Amazon.

cards.ability_description: 50% chance to avoid debuffs.

cards.name: Sharpening Stone

info.card_album_desc: The Stone has a chance of turning powerful attacks into one-shot-kills, making it a viable choice on any Amazon.

cards.ability_description: Increases your chance to crit by 25%.

cards.name: Valkyrie's Charm

info.card_album_desc: The extra speed can turn some bad matchups into good matchups. Most commonly used on Ashi, Helene, or Anex.

cards.ability_description: Increases attack speed by 1.

cards.name: Herbal Remedy

info.card_album_desc: Helene and Ashi are durable enough to gain a lot of hit points from the Remedy and Andromeda can range-dance well enough to do the same.

cards.ability_description: Heals 3 hit points per turn while this character is in battle.

cards.name: Deadly Poison

info.description: Your attacks have a 70% chance to deal 2 poison damage to the enemy each turn for 5 turns.
info.card_album_desc: Great on Zina to poison the whole enemy team. Also good for Tafari or Popo to add a little punch to their attacks.

cards.ability_description: Your attacks have a 70% chance to deal 2 poison damage to the enemy each turn for 5 turns.

cards.name: Elusive Feather

info.card_album_desc: The Feather makes Popo especially hard to hit with physical attacks, though it's also helpful on Juju as an aid to landing Touch of Doom. Useful on any Villager if physical attacks become important in the metagame.

cards.ability_description: Increases your chance to dodge physical attacks by 25%.

cards.name: Death Mask

info.description: When you would die instead you die at the end of next turn.
info.card_album_desc: Getting one extra turn to live is especially good for Juju so he can land a Touch of Doom, but really any Villager benefits from getting one more turn to attack.

cards.ability_description: When you would die, instead you die at the end of the next turn.

cards.name: Quickening Powder

info.description: Each turn, there's a 50% chance that all your attacks are 3 speed faster.
info.card_album_desc: The unpredictability of Quickening powder can help any Villager sneak in an attack faster than the enemy realizes is possible.

cards.ability_description: Each turn, there's a 50% chance that all your attacks are 3 speed faster.

cards.name: Gem of Souls

info.description: When you defeat an opponent, you gain their innate ability and 30 energy.
info.card_album_desc: The Gem is a wild card that sometimes does nothing (if you don't kill an enemy character) and sometimes sets up amazing situations for you.

cards.ability_description: When you defeat an opponent, you gain their innate ability and 30 energy.

cards.name: Phylactery

info.description: If you're hit with an attack that would normally kill you, there is a 30% chance to survive with 1 HP and take no damage for the rest of the turn.
info.card_album_desc: Most of the time the Phylactery does nothing, but when it comes through and gives you multiple extra lives, it seems incredibly powerful.

cards.ability_description: If you're hit with an attack that would normally kill you, there is a 30% chance to survive with 1 HP and take no damage for the rest of the turn.

cards.name: Blood Vial

info.description: When this character is on the bench, heal 3 hp per turn instead of the usual 1 hp.
info.card_album_desc: The extra healing power of the Vial is a great help to Cornelius, Ambrosia, and Vanessa, but Cain actually likes to fight at low hit points and the Marquis probably gains enough health from his innate ability.

cards.ability_description: While you're not in battle, you heal 3 hit points per turn instead of the usual 1.

cards.name: Necronomic Tomes

info.description: Dark magic and physical attacks have a 30% chance to deal 8 extra damage and heal your character for 8 health.
info.card_album_desc: Ambrosia is notorious for liking the Tomes, but every Vampire enjoys their life draining ability.

cards.ability_description: Your dark magic and physical attacks have a 30% chance to deal 8 extra damage and heal your character for 8 health.

cards.name: Healing Salve

info.description: While in battle, this character heals 2 HP per turn.
info.card_album_desc: Good on characters who can last a while. Juju, Higashi, and Onimaru can last, while Andromeda, Tafari, and Amaya can 'range dance' to maximize its use.  The Salve can also help a lot in some mirror matchups, such as Cornelius vs. Cornelius.

cards.ability_description: Heals 2 hit points per turn while your character is in battle.

cards.name: Stoneheel Totem

info.description: You must use 5 additional energy to change range.
info.card_album_desc: Good on - or against - any single-range character, such as Onimaru, Helene, or Ashi. It's also good against characters with powerful moves that cost 50 energy such as Cornelius. It has good synergy with Ubuntu and Andromeda - those with energy-gaining advantages.

cards.ability_description: Your enemy pays 5 additional energy to change ranges.

cards.name: Girdle of Iron Will

info.description: Immune to stuns, interrupts, and critical hits.
info.card_album_desc: Used best on characters with a slow, powerful move that they don't want interrupted. Cornelius and Juju are good examples, as are Onimaru and Andromeda. It's also good against stun or intercept-heavy opponents, such as Rumiko, Yoshiro, or Higashi.

cards.ability_description: You are immune to stuns, interrupts, and critical hits.

cards.name: General's Insignia

info.description: Increases the damage of all your single-hit attacks by 4.
info.card_album_desc: The insignia needs to go on a character who relies on single-hit attacks, such as Yoshiro, Higashi, or Anex. It has particular synergy with Marquis LeMorte because his life draining moves benefit doubly from it.

cards.ability_description: Increases the damage of all your single-hit attacks by 4.

cards.name: Yellow Rock of Cowards

info.description: Take 8 damage if you switch out, or 16 damage if your opponent also switches.
info.card_album_desc: Works well with Rumiko (because of her safer switching ability) and Marquis LeMorte (he likes switching out anyway). Also good on anyone if you want to get the take off the last few hit points from an enemy without having to guess much.

cards.ability_description: Deals 8 damage to the enemy when you or he switches out, or 16 if you both switch out simultaneously.

cards.name: Mindreader's Chalice

info.description: Successful interrupts deal 15 additional damage and fully restore this characters energy.
info.card_album_desc: Good on any character, if you have the mindreading powers to back it up. It's especially good on characters that can force a deadly 50/50 guessing game with it, such as Onimaru, Ashi, Cornelius, Juju, or Ubuntu. Just don't equip it on Tafari.

cards.ability_description: When you successfully intercept, you gain full energy and deal 15 additional damage.

cards.name: Amaya, the Exiled Student

attacks.description: Attacks all enemies and hits even a fleeing opponent.
attacks.name: Shadow Wrath

attacks.description: Reduces the hit rate of all enemies by 20% for 6 turns, hits even a fleeing opponent.
attacks.name: Shadow Curse

procs.effects: Effect : ["Hits Fleeing Opponent"], Attack Hit Rate : -20%

attacks.description: If hits, causes Amaya to teleport away and sets the range to far.
attacks.name: Ninja-port

attacks.description: May burn the foe for 3 damage each for 4 turns.
attacks.name: Dark Chi Blast

info.description: Disables one of the enemy's attacks at random each turn

cards.ability_description: Each turn, Amaya disables one of the enemy's attacks at random.
cards.description:
Amaya is the tricky, mysterious type. Teleporting and disabling attacks make Amaya hard to pin down, but don't try to trade blows toe-to-toe.

Group: Martial Artists
Strengths: Dark Magic, Range-Chance, Attacks All Enemies
Vulnerabilities: Physical Attacks, Light Magic, Health

cards.name: Ashi, the Axe Battler

attacks.description: A very damaging swing.
attacks.name: Signature Slice

attacks.description: Has a high chance to knock the foe out of the battle.
attacks.name: Power Swing

attacks.description: A very fast attack.
attacks.name: Axe Handle

attacks.description: This may cause the opponent to bleed for 3 damage each for 4 turns.
attacks.name: Bleeding Slice

cards.ability_description: Ashi is immune to interrupts.
cards.description:
Ashi is a strong woman with huge...physical prowess, but keep her at a distance and she's at a loss.

Group: Amazons
Strengths: Physical Attacks, Physical Defense, Health
Vulnerabilities: Long-Range Attacks, Dark Magic Attacks, Speed

cards.name: Zina, the Beast Mistress

attacks.description: Knocks a buff off the enemy.
attacks.name: Tiger Pounce

attacks.description: Viciously attacks a single enemy at random.
attacks.name: Eye of the Tiger

attacks.description: Hits all enemies.
attacks.name: Tiger Frenzy

attacks.description: All tiger attacks have a 40% chance to cause bleeding and stun for 3 turns.
attacks.name: Mistress's Command

info.description: Chance for Stun and Bleed on Tiger Attacks
Zina's pet has tasted blood, all it's attacks have changed to dark magic and it will do an additional 20% damage for 3 turns.
When Zina's pet slays an enemy, the pet feeds on the corpse, powering up pet attacks by 20% for 3 turns, changing its attacks to dark magic, and gives +30 energy.

cards.ability_description: Zina gains 30 energy and +20% damage for 3 turns after killing blow.
cards.description:
Zina is fierce, but her tiger is fiercer. No one, not even a deck character, is safe from his attack.

Group: Villagers
Strengths: Physical Attacks, Multi-Enemy Attacks
Vulnerabilities: Physical Attacks, Low Defense

cards.name: Vanessa Voss, the Daywalker

attacks.description: Radiates light in all directions, damaging all enemies.
attacks.name: Radiance Burst

attacks.description: High chance for a critical hit.
attacks.name: Double Slash

attacks.description: Focuses a powerful beam of light at the enemy.
attacks.name: Ray of Light

attacks.description: Steals half the life it drains.
attacks.name: Feast of Blood

info.description: Deals 1 extra damage per dark resistance of the target

cards.ability_description: Vanessa Voss deals 1 extra damage per dark resistance of the target.
cards.description:
Vanessa Voss is deadly to those who deal in dark magic, but dark magic might well be the death of her.

Group: Vampires
Strengths: Strongest Against Dark Magic, Self-Healing, Light Magic, Multi-Enemy Attacks
Vulnerabilities: Dark Magic Attacks

cards.name: Origami Crane

immune: single hit attack final damage bonus

info.description: Your attacks cannot miss, and you are immune to stat-lowering effects.
info.card_album_desc: If you're tired of your attacks missing, use the Crane on any Martial Artist. Also good against attacks or items that lower hit-rate, such as Ring of Curses or an enemy Amaya.

cards.ability_description: Your attacks cannot miss, and you are immune to stat-lowering effects.

cards.name: Reinforced Breastplate

info.card_album_desc: A handy item on any Amazon whenever the metagame shifts towards lots of physical-type damage.

cards.ability_description: Increases physical armor by 4, dark resist by 1, and light resist by 1.

cards.name: Tiger's Claw

info.description: When you attempt to attack or intercept, the enemy's damage is reduced by 2 until the end of the turn.
info.card_album_desc: The Claw weakens the enemy, giving you a bit more time to set up your own attacks.

cards.ability_description: When you attempt to attack or intercept, the enemy's damage is reduced by 2 until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Ring of Curses

info.description: Each time you're hit by an attack, the attacker's hit rate is reduced by 15% for 10 turns.
info.card_album_desc: You have to get hit to trigger the effect of the ring, so it's probably best on a life gaining character such as Ambrosia, Vanessa, or the Marquis.

cards.ability_description: Each time you're hit by an attack, the attacker's hit rate is reduced by 15% for 10 turns.

cards.name: Auger Blackboot, Ship's Captain

attacks.description: Has a chance to interrupt an incoming attack.
attacks.name: Rapid-fire Pistol

attacks.description: Very high chance for a critical hit.
attacks.name: Aimed Pistol

attacks.description: Reflects any incoming light magic attack back at the foe. Can't be used 2 turns in a row.
attacks.name: Captain's Mirror

attacks.description: Causes the enemy to attack himself with a close-range move.
attacks.name: Word of Command

info.description: Chance to order enemy not to attack next turn after taking physical damage.

cards.ability_description: When hit by a physical attack, 50% chance of ordering enemy to not attack next turn.
cards.description:
Like any great leader, Auger specializes in confusing his opponents into using their own attacks against themselves.

Group: Pirates
Strengths: Long-range interrupts, key managerial efficiency in addressing core demographic issues preventing streamlined process and cohesive structure
Vulnerabilities: Light magic, close-range combat

cards.name: Ranec Vest, Ghost Pirate

attacks.description: Has a chance to knock a buff off the enemy.
attacks.name: Two-sword Slash

attacks.description: Sets range to close.
attacks.name: Psycho Crusher

attacks.description: A chilling touch makes the enemy's attacks cost 15 more energy until end of next turn.
attacks.name: Ghostly Touch

attacks.description: For the next 3 turns, any enemy who switches in takes 10 damage.
attacks.name: Le Chuck's Curse

info.description: Will take damage upon switching in.
Physical attacks pass through Ranec Vest until he fully manifests

cards.ability_description: When Ranec Vest enters play, physical attacks pass through him until the end of next turn.
cards.description:
Ranec was once struck down and made more powerful than you could possibly imagine, but he won't easily suffer the same fate again.

Group: Pirates
Strengths: Close-range combat, brief physical immunity
Vulnerabilities: Light magic, long-range combat

cards.name: Darla Cross, the Saucy Wench

attacks.description: Has a chance to stun the enemy.
attacks.name: Parrot Torpedo

attacks.description: Steals the enemy's item, giving you its power.
attacks.name: Parrot Pilfer

attacks.description: Has a good chance to poison the enemy for 3 damage each turn for 2 turns.
attacks.name: Poisoned Blade

attacks.description: Four quick dagger tosses with a high chance to bleed 3 damage for 2 turns.
attacks.name: Quad Daggers

info.description: 10% chance to steal enemy's item each turn

cards.ability_description: Each turn, her parrot has a 10% of fetching the enemy's item.
cards.description:
Sailing the seas with a handful of knives, some poisonous brew and a thieving parrot, Darla is living out every young girl's dream.

Group: Pirates
Strengths: Stealing items, long-range combat
Vulnerabilities: Physical damage, close-range combat

cards.name: Balthazar Bomb-britches, the Cannoneer

attacks.description: Enables Balthazar Bomb-britches, the Cannoneer to fire his cannon once.
attacks.name: Load Cannon

procs.effects: Cast : { target : self, effects : { Enable Choice: Attack 2 }, permanent : true, stackable : true, info : {display: Attack Unlocked, icon : unlocked, description : "Fire Cannon attack unlocked"}, name : Load Cannon }

attacks.description: A devastating attack that deals 10 splash damage to all enemies, ignoring defense.
attacks.name: Fire Cannon

attacks.description: Has a chance to stun the enemy.
attacks.name: Shot-put

attacks.description: Knocks the enemy to far range.
attacks.name: Drop Kick

cards.ability_description: Balthazar Bomb-britches cannot be stunned.
cards.description:
A philosopher once said, "Cannons are designed to hurt." Opponents would be foolish to allow Balthazar to load and fire his favorite toy.

Group: Pirates
Strengths: Long-range splash damage, stun immunity
Vulnerabilities: Cannon load time, close-range combat

cards.name: Starbuck, the Strapping First Mate

attacks.description: Two solid punches with a high chance to crit.
attacks.name: The Old One, Two

attacks.description: Has a chance to daze the enemy, forcing them to attack randomly next turn.
attacks.name: Gigaton Punch

attacks.description: Ignores the enemy's physical defense.
attacks.name: Anchor Toss

attacks.description: If this attack hits first, has a chance to cancel the enemy's attack.
attacks.name: Tackle

cards.ability_description: All Starbuck's attacks have a high chance to crit.
cards.description:
A shirt would only slow Starbuck down, as he clobbers and confuses those who engage in a close-range brawl.

Group: Pirates
Strengths: Close-range combat, physical resistance
Vulnerabilities: Any magic, long-range combat

cards.name: Ornamental Egg

info.card_album_desc: Particularly effective with Auger's Rapid-fire Pistol, Balthazar's Shot-put, and Starbuck's Gigaton Punch.

cards.ability_description: Increases your proc rates ("chance on hit" rates) by 50%.

cards.name: Navigator's Sextant

info.description: 50% chance to prevent enemy switch out.
info.card_album_desc: Unless they're walking the plank, no one escapes a pirate! Keep your enemies close by with the Navigator's Sextant.

cards.ability_description: Whenever the enemy tries to switch out, there is a 50% his switchout fails, and this item breaks.

cards.name: Captain's Grog Mug

info.description: If you are below 30% health, gain 25 life, then this item breaks.
info.card_album_desc: Best used with Balthazar, as his high health makes a killing blow from over 30% less likely. Least effective with Darla Cross.

cards.ability_description: If you are below 30% health, gain 25 life, then this item breaks. (Doesn't save you from a killing blow.)

cards.name: Cursed Doubloons

info.description: Your opponent loses one hit point and two energy points each turn.
info.card_album_desc: For long fights, this drain can really add up, effectively lowering an opponent's energy regeneration by 10%.

cards.ability_description: Your opponent loses one hit point and two energy points each turn.

cards.name: Polished Spyglass

immune: single hit attack final damage bonus

info.description: Your attacks cannot miss, and you are immune to stat-lowering effects.
info.card_album_desc: The pirates are already an accurate bunch, but stat-lowering effects from enemies are fairly common.

cards.ability_description: Your attacks cannot miss, and you are immune to stat-lowering effects.

cards.name: Knight Wei-shan, of the Easterly Wind

attacks.description: Reduces the damage of the enemy's 1-hit attacks by 10 for 3 more turns.
attacks.name: Crippling Palm

procs.effects: Single Hit Attack Final Damage Bonus : -10

attacks.description: High chance for a critical hit.
attacks.name: Dashing Strike

attacks.description: A high chance to cure all your team's ailments.
attacks.name: Healing Wind

attacks.description: Next turn, the whirlwind deals 45 damage to any close-range enemy. Lasts 3 turns.
attacks.name: Whirlwind

procs.effects: Trap : {Type : Light Magic, HP : 45, Sprung By : Close }

cards.ability_description: When Knight Wei-shan rests, a warm wind heals 4 hit points and cures one debuff.
cards.description:
While relatively weak in direct combat, Wei-Shan specializes in healing allies and weakening foes.

Group: Knights
Strengths: Healing, curing debuffs, lowering enemy power
Vulnerabilities: Direct combat at either range

cards.name: Knight Bestor, of the Western Flame

attacks.description: Engulfs the caster and enemy in flames, burning each for 4 damage for 4 turns.
attacks.name: Engulfing Flames

attacks.description: High chance to inflict 5 elemental damage for 2 turns.
attacks.name: Flame Sword Frenzy

attacks.description: Attacks all enemies with a fiery shockwave that has a 33% chance to interrupt attacks.
attacks.name: Pyroclasm

attacks.description: Increases your team's crit rate by 15% (additive) for 10 turns.
attacks.name: Inner Fire

cards.ability_description: Burn effects heal Knight Bestor.
cards.description:
After a great warrior noticed Bestor snacking on flaming s'mores as a child, he was trained to master the burning arts.

Group: Knights
Strengths: Healed by fire (including his own), close-range combat
Vulnerabilities: Dark magic, long-range combat

cards.name: Knight Gunbjorn, of the Frozen North

attacks.description: Has a chance to cause 3 bleed damage for 2 turns.
attacks.name: Cold Steel Axe

attacks.description: If this attack hits first, has a chance to cancel the enemy's attack.
attacks.name: Helmet Ram

attacks.description: Slows the enemy's attacks by 2 for 2 turns.
attacks.name: Ice Shards

attacks.description: Enemy's range change costs +5 energy and takes 5 cold damage this and next two turns.
attacks.name: Bone Chill

procs.effects: Maneuver Energy Cost : 5, Damage Effect : {Type : Cold, HP: 5}

info.description: You must use +5 energy to change range.  Taking 5 cold damage per turn.

cards.ability_description: While Knight Gunbjorn is in play, enemy attacks cost an additional 5 energy to play.
cards.description:
"The frost -- sometimes, it makes the blade stick." Gunbjorn is a master of brute strength and slowing his opponents with ice.

Group: Knights
Strengths: Slowing, hindering enemy mobility and actions, close-range combat
Vulnerabilities: Dark magic, long-range combat

cards.name: Knight Oxbox, of the Southern Rocks

attacks.description: Has a chance to stun the enemy.
attacks.name: Warhammer Smash

attacks.description: Sets the range to close and makes range changes cost the enemy 5 more energy next turn.
attacks.name: Warhammer Ram

procs.effects: Cast : { Target : Enemy, Effects : { Maneuver Energy Cost : +5 }, length : 1, name : Warhammer Ram, info : {display : Rammed, icon : slow_enemy, description : You must use +5 energy to change ranges } }

attacks.description: Blinds all enemies with sand, causing their hit rates to lower by 15% for 4 turns.
attacks.name: Sandstorm

attacks.description: High chance to gain +6/1/1 physical/light/dark resists for the next three turns.
attacks.name: Stoneskin Dance

info.description: Deals 5 damage to all enemies upon entering play

cards.ability_description: When Knight Oxbox comes into play, an earthquake deals 5 damage to all enemy characters.
cards.description:
A master of earth, Oxbox blinds his opponents while keeping them close and smashing them with his hammer.

Group: Knights
Strengths: Close-range combat, limiting enemy mobility
Vulnerabilities: Dark magic

cards.name: Fallen Knight Rathbone, the Betrayer

attacks.description: Does 20 damage to the enemy and a random ally, and heals for half the damage done.
attacks.name: Soul Siphon

procs.effects: Effect : Attack enemy and one ally

attacks.description: Deals 13 damage to all enemies, but also 4 damage to all allies.
attacks.name: Reckless Firestorm

attacks.description: Chance to reduce enemy's damage by 2 for 3 turns.
attacks.name: Heart of Darkness

attacks.description: Interrupts slower attacks and enemy attacks his teammate. Can't be used 2 turns in a row.
attacks.name: Domination

cards.ability_description: Fallen Knight Rathbone is immune to interrupts.
cards.description:
Regarding his foes with complete disdain and his allies as mere pawns, Rathbone crushes all who stand in his way -- or anyone who stands anywhere, really.

Group: Knights
Strengths: Deadly against benched characters, high damage overall
Vulnerabilities: Light magic, has low health, some attacks damage teammates

cards.name: Knight's Emblem

info.description: You cannot be damaged while out of play.
info.card_album_desc: Characters like Vanessa Voss, Amaya, Zina, and Rathbone (even on your team!) can make being out of play less than perfectly safe without a Knight's Emblem.

cards.ability_description: You cannot be damaged while you're out of play.

cards.name: Hero's Flagon

info.description: Cure one debuff and heal self for 10 upon switching out..
info.card_album_desc: Perhaps most effective when used with Oxbox -- switch him in and out to maximize his earthquake innate, and pick up some healing along the way.

cards.ability_description: When you switch out, cure one debuff and gain 10 life.

cards.name: Ring of Bravery

info.description: When you attempt to attack or intercept, you deal 3 additional damage (no matter what the enemy does)
info.card_album_desc: Hate switching out, or using your precious energy for changing ranges? Do you prefer to instead unleash constant direct attacks? The Ring of Bravery is for you!

cards.ability_description: When you attempt to attack or intercept, you deal 3 additional damage (no matter what the enemy does).

cards.name: Bracers of Righteousness

info.description: Physical armor +1, light resistance +1, dark resistance +2.
info.card_album_desc: Particularly effective when facing off against witches and vampires, who rely heavily on dark magic attacks.

cards.ability_description: Increases your  physical armor by 1, light resistance by 1, and dark resistance by 2.

cards.name: Elemental Prism

info.description: When you use a light magic attack or buff, or get hit by a light magic attack, 30% chance the Prism deals 6 elemental damage to all foes.
info.card_album_desc: Due to their respective number of light magic attacks, the Elemental Prism is most effective on Bestor and least effective on Rathbone.

cards.ability_description: When you use a light magic attack or buff, or get hit by a light magic attack, 30% chance the Prism deals 6 elemental damage to all foes.

cards.name: Angelan Series D, the Covert Operative

attacks.description: Chance to neutralize incoming light magic attacks this turn.
attacks.name: Wave Motion Fist

attacks.description: Increases your chance to avoid incoming attacks by 33%.
attacks.name: Cloak

procs.effects: Dodge Bonus : { Physical : +33%, Light Magic : +33%, Dark Magic : +33% }, Enable Choice: Attack 3, Critical Hit Rate attack 3: +50

info.description: Dodge increased by 33%.  Surprise Attack enabled.  Precision Strike crit rate increased by 50% for one turn.

attacks.description: Can only be done after cloaking. Deals very high damage.
attacks.name: Surprise Attack

attacks.description: If you cloaked last turn, this has a +50% chance for critical hit.
attacks.name: Precision Strike

cards.ability_description: When Angelan Series D rests, her attacks cost 5 less energy for the next 4 turns.
cards.description:
A stealthed, deadly, unpredictable killing machine, Angelan just might be behind you RIGHT NOW!

Group: Robots
Strengths: Avoiding damage, high burst damage, range flexibility
Vulnerabilities: Dark magic, setup time

cards.name: Gorbax-Mark 2, the War Machine

attacks.description: A rapid stream of bullets.
attacks.name: Machine Gun Arm

attacks.description: Increases Gorbax-Mark 2, the War Machine's hit rate by 50% for the next 3 turns.
attacks.name: Lock-on

info.description: Hit rate increased by 50% for 3 turns.

attacks.description: A devastating attack that deals 10 splash light magic damage to all benched enemies.
attacks.name: Omega Missile

procs.effects: Damage Effect : { Type : Light Magic, hp : 10 }

attacks.description: Shoots random blasts in all directions, damaging all enemies.
attacks.name: Death Blossom

info.description: Can use hit points for energy costs.

cards.ability_description: Gorbax-Mark 2 can use hit points for energy costs.
cards.description:
Extremely powerful yet somewhat clumsy, Gorbax must lock on to targets before unleashing his arsenal with any reliable accuracy.

Group: Robots
Strengths: Physical defense, high health, high damage, long-range combat
Vulnerabilities: Dark magic, setup time

cards.name: B9, Enviro-Control Robot

attacks.description: High chance to stun the enemy for a turn.
attacks.name: Pincer Grab

attacks.description: High chance to reduce the enemy's hit rate by 20% for 4 turns.
attacks.name: Electrifying Grab

attacks.description: A potent series of laser shots.
attacks.name: Berzerk Laser Blasts

attacks.description: Heals one debuff and 10 hit points on yourself and each ally. Can't be used two turns in a row.
attacks.name: Protect Family

procs.effects: Cast : [{ Target : Self, Effects : { disable choice : attack 4 }, Length : 1, unremovable : true, Name : Protect Family Cooldown, Info : { hide_display : true, description : Must wait before protecting family again., icon : unlocked_attack } }, {Target : Party, Effects : { Effect : Remove Debuff }, Info : { hide_display : true }}]

info.description: B9 deals 10 damage to the enemy when both characters rest.

cards.ability_description: B9 deals 10 damage whenever both players rest at the same time.
cards.description:
Originally developed by Child Protective Services, B9 doubles as an oddly effective combat machine.

Group: Robots
Strengths: Range flexibility, healing allies, hindering enemy actions
Vulnerabilities: Dark magic

cards.name: IBO-K9, the Artifical Companion

attacks.description: Can cause the enemy to bleed for 4 damage for 2 turns.
attacks.name: Claw, Claw, Bite

attacks.description: Deafening bark can stun the opponent.
attacks.name: Sonic Bark

attacks.description: Invigorates your teammates, reducing their energy costs to zero for the next three turns.
attacks.name: Uplifting Yelp

attacks.description: Sacrifice yourself for a deadly attack, deal 10 splash dark magic damage to all benched enemies.
attacks.name: Self-destruct

procs.effects: Damage Effect : { Type : Dark Magic, hp : 10 }

info.description: For two rounds after switching in, range changes are free.
For two rounds after switching in, range changes are free.

cards.ability_description: Range changes are free for 2 rounds after switching in.
cards.description:
Highly mobile and fiercely loyal, IBO's bark and self-destructive explosions are even worse than his bite.

Group: Robots
Strengths: Mobility, team utility, range flexibility
Vulnerabilities: Low health, low damage not involving self-destruction

cards.name: MR-V1N, the Synthetic Depressive

attacks.description: Different strikes for different folks.
attacks.name: Indifferent Strikes

attacks.description: Has a high chance to drain 30 energy from the victim.
attacks.name: Energy Sap

attacks.description: Saps the will to live, often slowing enemy attacks by 2 for two more turns.
attacks.name: Forlorn Poetry

attacks.description: Lowers dark magic resistance of all enemies by 3 for 3 turns.
attacks.name: Depressive Mood

cards.ability_description: When MR-V1N successfully switches out, he drains 40 energy from the enemy.
cards.description:
Meh, what's the point...

Group: Robots
Strengths: Slowing down and draining energy from enemies, high dark magic resistance
Vulnerabilities: Light magic, deals low damage

cards.name: Energy Core

info.description: When you take an action that would put your energy below 0, you gain 50 energy and this item breaks.
info.card_album_desc: The Energy Core allows for a high amount of burst damage when used with high-energy abilities. Particularly effective against full enemy teams with Gorbax-Mark 2.

cards.ability_description: When you take an action that would put your energy below 0, you gain 50 energy and this item breaks.

cards.name: Z-Phase Converter

info.description: Each point of damage you take is converted to 1 energy.
info.card_album_desc: Like the Energy Core, the Z-Phase Converter can enhance high-cost burst damage, though in a bit more of a sustained fashion.

cards.ability_description: Each point of damage you take is converted to 1 energy.

cards.name: Omega Boosters

info.description: Your light and dark magic attacks and buffs have a 50% chance of causing 5 burning damage for 3 turns.
info.card_album_desc: Slightly less effective with Angelan Series D due to half her attacks being physical, but overall a rounded item that deals a bit of extra damage.

cards.ability_description: Your light and dark magic attacks and buffs have a 50% chance of causing 5 burning damage for 3 turns.

cards.name: A66 Capacitor

info.description: Whenever you have ten or less energy, deal 5 damage to all enemies.
info.card_album_desc: Meshes especially well with Gorbax-Mark 2's innate ability, since getting him to 0 energy doesn't require much planning.

cards.ability_description: Whenever you have ten or less energy, deal 5 damage to all enemies.

cards.name: Null Matrix

info.card_album_desc: If a specific enemy item is proving particularly bothersome, just switch in a robot with the Null Matrix equipped.

cards.ability_description: While in play, nullifies the effect of the opposing team's items.

cards.name: Eva Bovary, the Neophyte

attacks.description: Steals half the life it drains, high chance to crit.
attacks.name: Kiss

attacks.description: Has a chance to deal 5 burn damage for 2 turns.
attacks.name: Searing Touch

attacks.description: Interrupts slower attacks and causes enemy to attack self with a close-range move.
attacks.name: Head Over Heels

attacks.description: Hits even a fleeing opponent. Don't leave her or you'll be burned.
attacks.name: Fiery Passion

info.description: Has a 25% chance to stop enemy from attacking upon entering play.

cards.ability_description: When Eva enters play, 25% chance her love spell prevents enemy attacks this turn.
cards.description:
When an old mystic ritual called for men's tears, crushed hearts, wrinkled love letters and rain-soaked roses, Eva hopped back into the dating scene.

Group: Witches
Strengths: Manipulating close-range specialists, striking fleeing opponents
Vulnerabilities: Physical damage, long-range specialists

cards.name: Agathe de Grey, the Old Crone

attacks.description: Counts down for 3 turns, then deals 99 damage, unless the victim switches out first.
attacks.name: Mark of the Witch

info.description: Doomed, take 99 damage after 3 turns unless you switch out first.

procs.effects: Effect : Consume Mark of The Witch

attacks.description: A deft blow.
attacks.name: Broom Strike

attacks.description: Has a chance to knock a buff off the enemy.
attacks.name: Wild Broom Ride

attacks.description: Deals 5 damage and heals Agathe de Grey, the Old Crone for 5 each turn for 3 turns.
attacks.name: Witch's Curse

info.description: Deals 4 damage at the end of each round if the range is close.

cards.ability_description: Agathe de Grey deals 4 stench damage per turn at close range.
cards.description:
Agathe turned to combat after her overpowering stench prevented children from being lured into her Limburg cheese house.

Group: Witches
Strengths: Self-healing, instant-kill curse
Vulnerabilities: Light magic, direct combat

cards.name: Sophie Merovingian, the Symbologist

attacks.description: Burns the foe for 8 fire damage each turn for 4 turns. Doesn't stack.
attacks.name: Glyph of Fire

attacks.description: Detonates victim's Glyph for heavy damage, heals you 9 hp. (Victim must be Glyphed first.)
attacks.name: Consume Glyph

attacks.description: Deals 15 damage to all enemies and self, hits fleeing. Costs no energy if cast last turn.
attacks.name: Circle of Shadows

procs.effects: Cast : [ { Target : Self, Effects : { Attack 2 Energy Cost : -35 }, stackable : false, length : 1, name : Clear Casting, info : {icon : restore_energy, description : Circle of Shadows costs zero energy., name : Clear Casting } }, { target : enemy party, effects : { Damage Effect : { Type: Dark Magic, hp : 15 } }, name : Circle of Shadows, info : { hide_display : true } } ]

attacks.description: Deals 6 shadow damage for 7 turns. Doesn't stack and can't be removed.
attacks.name: Shadow Word: Pain

info.description: Cannot be healed while Sophie Merovingian is in play.

cards.ability_description: Enemy characters cannot heal (even from the bench) while Sophie Merovingian is in play.
cards.description:
A master of fire and shadow, Sophie can deal massive steady damage given a bit of setup time.

Group: Witches
Strengths: High damage over time
Vulnerabilities: Physical damage, light magic, no setup-free burst damage

cards.name: Sadie Trudeau, the Summoner

attacks.description: Pinches pressure points and can stun the opponent.
attacks.name: 5-Point Pinch

attacks.description: A very fast attack.
attacks.name: Demon Claws

attacks.description: Has a chance to attack an extra enemy.
attacks.name: Demon Frenzy

procs.effects: Effect : Attack enemy and one bench enemy

attacks.description: Next turn, the vortex deals 45 damage to any close-range enemy. Lasts 3 turns.
attacks.name: Nether Vortex

procs.effects: Trap : {Type : Dark Magic, HP : 45, Sprung By : Close }

info.description: Sadie's Demon revels in the death of an opponent and its attacks will do an additional 30% damage for 3 turns.
When Sadie kills an opponent her Demon revels in the death, dealing 30% more damage for 3 turns.

cards.ability_description: When Sadie Trudeau kills an enemy, her demon's power increases by 30% for 3 turns.
cards.description:
Made from sugar and tonic and everything demonic, Sadie and her demon are a force to be reckoned with.

Group: Witches
Strengths: Dark magic resistance, range flexibility
Vulnerabilities: Physical damage, light magic

cards.name: Margo Curie, the Potion Brewer

attacks.description: High chance to burn the enemy for 4 damage each turn for 3 turns.
attacks.name: Acid Splash

attacks.description: Reduces the enemy's damage by 2 for 3 turns.
attacks.name: Heartache Cocktail

attacks.description: Causes the enemy to act randomly for 2 turns. (They won't switch or intercept.)
attacks.name: Hallucinogenic Incense

attacks.description: Heals you to full hit points, but can only be used once per game.
attacks.name: Healing Potion

procs.effects: Cast : { Target : Self, Effects : { disable choice : attack 4 }, permanent : true, unremovable: true, Info : { display : "Potion used", description : "Cannot use healing potion again", icon : unlocked_attack } , Name : "Healing Potion Used"}

info.description: High chance to cure all status ailments of her teammates when resting

cards.ability_description: When Margo rests, 90% chance to cure all status ailments of her teammates with a potion.
cards.description:
Dissatisfied with the potency of over-the-counter potions, Margo transformed her basement into a bathtub-brewing laboratory.

Group: Witches
Strengths: Self-healing, confusing enemies
Vulnerabilities: Direct combat, physical damage

cards.name: Sigil of Heartache

info.description: When an enemy switches out, he takes 4 bleeding damage each turn for 4 turns.
info.card_album_desc: Saying goodbye is never easy, but bleeding profusely afterward can make it especially difficult.

cards.ability_description: When an enemy switches out, he takes 4 bleeding damage each turn for 4 turns.

cards.name: Periapt of Proof Against Poison and Other Things

info.description: Poison, cold, burn, and elemental effects heal you instead of damaging you. (Does not protect against direct attacks.)
info.card_album_desc: These effects are fairly common, and some characters rely on these effects for much of their damage. The Periapt is effectively a lock-out for these abilities at worst, and a complete reversal at best, if your opponent isn't paying attention!

cards.ability_description: Poison, cold, burn, and elemental effects heal you instead of damaging you. (Does not protect against direct attacks.)

cards.name: Coffin Nails

info.description: When your character would die, the killing blow is directed at another one of your characters instead, then this item breaks.
info.card_album_desc: Though its usefulness might seem questionable at first, the Coffin Nails will guarantee that a slow, potentially game-changing attack (such as Margo's Hallucinogenic Incense) can't be canceled with death -- or at least not the first time.

cards.ability_description: When your character would die, the killing blow is directed at another one of your characters instead, then this item breaks.

cards.name: The Black Book

info.description: Affected character cannot switch next turn.
When you attempt to intercept, the enemy can't switch next turn.
info.card_album_desc: Take some guessing out of Kongai, and lock your opponent in place. The Black Book can really ruin Marquis Le Morte's day, or anyone else reliant on switching in and out frequently.

cards.ability_description: When you attempt to intercept, the enemy can't switch next turn.

cards.name: Tarot Card: The High Priestess

info.description: Reduces male character's chance to hit by 20%.
info.card_album_desc: The High Priestess - Least effective against teenage male players unable to resist building a boob-filled Kongai deck. Will affect masculine robots, but not young villagers whose gender can't be determined by the high priestess.

cards.ability_description: Reduces male characters' chance to hit by 20%.
